Review: Been on 25mg of zyprexa zydis for about 4 months, it cause weight gain and akathisia for me. Hallucinations decreases but still delusional
Good for emergency situations. Versatile, quick acting, wish it came in 10mg tabs.
I like it that it dissolves in your mouth just like M&M's, but I don't like the tranquilization of this medication.
So far after 3 weeks this medication is assisting my son to gain clarity, stop hearing voices and it has helped to ensure that he gets the medicines into his system.
